main event: The provided text contains multiple sightings and incidents related to UFOs, including radar contact and visual sightings of unidentified objects, as well as reports of strange lights in the sky and unusual phenomena in various locations from the Gulf of Mexico to New York City.
interesting points: Multiple documented sightings of strange objects in the sky, some observed on radar and visually by credible witnesses such as Coast Guard crewmen and civilian airport staff.
Reports of mysterious objects exhibiting unusual behavior, such as hovering, moving at high speeds, glowing with a reddish color, and disappearing suddenly.
Description of a large, disc-shaped object observed near Broadway, New York City, hovering and moving rapidly out of sight.
Involvement of organizations like the U.S. Coast Guard, Civilian Saucer Investigation (CSI) of New York, and the Air Force in attempting to understand and investigate these sightings.
Incidents involving not only sightings, but also radar contact with unidentified objects, adding credibility to the reports.
location: various locations including the Gulf of Mexico, New York City, and Del Rosa Airport
witnesses: Coast Guard crewmen, radar operators, civilian airport staff, and multiple other witnesses
photographs: no the report does not include photographs
